title: Webinar: Measuring Performance in Ag Extension: Common Metrics Framework

tasks.task: Presenting on Measuring Performance in Agricultural Extension
subtasks: Explain the Best Fit Framework and its limitations
Outline the initiative by Feed the Future's Developing Local Extension Capacity (DELEC) for common metrics
Define extension and its target audience
Discuss outcome pillars related to productivity, resilience, and empowerment
Describe domains for measurement including systems, inputs, delivery, outputs, and outcomes
Address challenges in measuring extension, including causality and impact attribution
Present sample metrics from the Gates Foundation's extension dashboard
Facilitate discussion on adapting metrics for different contexts and service providers
Highlight the importance of integrating private sector and digital tools into extension evaluation
Invite participation in the task force and community of practice for refining metrics.
